gov.nasa.worldwind.util
Class CompoundStringBuffer

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.worldwind.util.CompoundBuffer<StringBuilder,CharSequence>
      gov.nasa.worldwind.util.CompoundStringBuffer

public class CompoundStringBuffer
extends CompoundBuffer<StringBuilder,CharSequence>

An implementation of CompoundBuffer which manages a collection of CharSequence buffers in a single StringBuilder.

Constructor Detail

CompoundStringBuffer

public CompoundStringBuffer(int initialCapacity,
                            int subSequenceLength)
Constructs a CompoundStringBuffer with the specified initial capacity.

Parameters:
initialCapacity - the compound buffer's initial capacity.
subSequenceLength - an estimate of the size of each sub-sequence.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the initialCapacity is negative.

CompoundStringBuffer

public CompoundStringBuffer(StringBuilder buffer,
                            IntBuffer subPositionBuffer,
                            IntBuffer subLengthBuffer,
                            int numSubBuffers)
Constructs a CompoundStringBuffer with the specified backing buffer, sub-buffer starting positions, sub-buffer lengths, and number of sub-buffers.

Parameters:
buffer - the backing buffer,
subPositionBuffer - the sub-buffer logical starting positions.
subLengthBuffer - the sub-buffer logical sizes.
numSubBuffers - the number of sub-buffers.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any of the buffer, subPositionBuffer, subLengthBuffer are null, if numSubBuffers is negative.

getSubString

public String getSubString(int index)
Returns the substring identified by the specified index. Index i corresponds to the ith string.

Parameters:
index - the index of the string to get.
Returns:
the string at the specified index.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the index is out of range.
